00042 #define CTK_SPE_THREAD_GROUP_MAX        32

00044 typedef struct ctk_spe_thread_group_body {
00045     unsigned int m_type;
00046     ctk_simple_list_t m_threads;
00047     ctk_uint32_t m_count;
00048     ctk_uint32_t m_max;
00049     ctk_env_t *m_env[CTK_SPE_THREAD_GROUP_MAX];
00050 } ctk_spe_thread_group_body_t;

00112 static inline int ctk_spe_thread_group_get_threads_count(ctk_spe_thread_group_t group) {
00113     if (group == NULL || ctk_simple_list_is_empty(&group->m_threads)) return 0;
00114     return group->m_count;
00115 }

00178 ctk_signal_group_write_reg1(ctk_spe_thread_group_t spe, unsigned int data)
